remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 建议你 使用 类和方法创建实例，而不是使用 。Instead of using the , we recommend that you create instances by using the class and the method. 这使您可以利用对 XML 1.0 建议的一致性检查和符合性。This enables you to take advantage of conformance checking and compliance to the XML 1.0 recommendation. `XmlNodeReader`能够读取 XML DOM 子树。The `XmlNodeReader` has the ability to read an XML DOM subtree. 此类不支持 (DTD) 或架构验证的文档类型定义。This class does not support document type definition (DTD) or schema validation. 但是，你可以创建一个 对象，该对象环绕 对象来验证存储在对象中的数据 ，如 "示例" 部分所示。However, you can create an object that wraps around the object to validate the data stored in the object, as shown in Examples section. ## Examples 在以下示例中，XML 文件加载到 XML 文档中并进行修改。In the following example, an XML file is loaded into an XML document and modified. XML 文档传递给 ，后者再传递给 方法。The XML document is passed to an , which is then passed to the method. 在验证读取器分析文件时，可以验证对 XML 文件所作的任何更改。When the validating reader parses the file, it can validate any changes made to the XML file. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 联网的 XML 文档包含使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制聚合的数据块，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体就是这样一个例子，但这并不局限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基本 URI 告诉您这些节点的来源。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 如果返回的节点没有基 URI (例如，则从内存中的字符串中分析它们) ，返回 String。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例分析文件，并显示每个节点的基 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each of the nodes. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 从此类返回的所有节点和属性名称都使用进行原子化 `NameTable` 。All node and attribute names returned from this class are atomized using the `NameTable`. 如果多次返回相同的名称 (例如， `Customer`) ，则 `String` 会为该名称返回相同的对象。When the same name is returned multiple times (for example, `Customer`), then the same `String` object is returned for that name. 这样一来，就可以编写有效的代码，对这些字符串进行对象比较，而不是对开销较高的字符串进行比较。This makes it possible for you to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings instead of expensive string comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法对内容进行流式处理，对 Base64 内容进行解码并返回解码的二进制字节 (例如，将内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区中。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以连续调用此方法以读取大量嵌入文本。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521 "MIME (多用途 Internet 邮件扩展) 第一项：用于指定和描述 Internet 邮件正文格式的机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 你可以从 [征求意见](https://www.rfc-editor.org)网站获取 rfc。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). > [!NOTE] > 在方法 返回值0之前，不应访问方法之间的任何读取器属性。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 当值达到其所操作的字节流的末尾时，返回值0。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 读取器定位在第一个非内容节点上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果请求的字节数少于或小于的字节数，则读取器将保留在其当前位置。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 以下 XML 节点类型不支持： Element、XmlDeclaration、None、Document、DocumentType、Notation、Entity、DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, DocumentFragment.

to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法读取内容，使用 Base64 编码对内容进行解码，并返回解码的二进制字节 (例如，将内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区中。This method reads the content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521 "MIME (多用途 Internet 邮件扩展) 第一项：用于指定和描述 Internet 邮件正文格式的机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 你可以从 [征求意见](https://www.rfc-editor.org)网站获取 rfc。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 此方法只能读取简单内容元素。This method can only read simple-content elements. 元素可以包含文本、空格、有效空白、CDATA 部分、注释和处理指令。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它还可以包含自动扩展的实体引用。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 元素不能有子元素。The element cannot have child elements. 此方法与方法非常类似， 只是它只能在元素节点类型上调用。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果 count 值大于文档中的字节数，或者它等于文档中的字节数，则 读取文档中的所有剩余字节并返回读取的字节数。If the count value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一 方法调用返回零，并将读取器移动到节点后面的节点 。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the node. 如果在 所有元素内容被使用之前调用，则读取器的行为可能与先使用第一个内容，然后 调用方法相同。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 这意味着读取器将读取所有文本，直到遇到结束元素。This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered. 然后读取结束标记节点，读取下一个节点，然后在下一个后续节点上定位自身。It then reads the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node. ## Examples 有关 使用此方法的示例，请参阅。See to see an example using this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 如果定位在某个元素上，则将 `ReadString` 所有文本、有效空白、空白和 CData 节节点类型一起连接起来，并将连接的数据作为元素内容返回。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CData section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 如果遇到任何标记，它将停止。It stops when any markup is encountered. 这可以在混合内容模型中发生，也可以在读取元素结束标记时发生。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果定位在类似于文本的节点上，将 `ReadString` 执行从文本节点到元素结束标记的相同串联。If positioned on a text-like node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果读取器定位在属性文本节点上，则 `ReadString` 与读取器定位在元素开始标记上时的功能相同。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它返回所有串联在一起的元素文本节点。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. ## Examples 下面的示例显示每个元素的文本内容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "参考" 页中的 "备注" 部分 。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此属性表示当前节点所在的 xml： lang 范围。This property represents the xml:lang scope within which the current node resides. 例如，以下是 `xml:lang` 根元素中设置为 US 英语的 XML 片段：For example, here is an XML fragment with `xml:lang` set to US English in the root element: ```xml Fred ``` 当读取器定位在元素上时 `name` ，可以使用此属性来查找它是否在美国英语特性的作用域中 `xml:lang` 。When the reader is positioned on the `name` element, you can use this property to find that it is in the scope of a US English `xml:lang` attribute. 返回的字符串也在中 。The string returned is also in .
